name: Transmorphification
description:
Transmorphification - Unreal Engine 4 2018 Spring Game Jam Entry.

A simple puzzle.

You will be shown a starting shape and colour. The game will then run through a variety of different coloured shapes and all you need to do is click the left mosue button or hit enter when you see a shape that matches the starting shape of the correct colour.

The only non-engine additional content used is the music which is by:

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
